statements.select: SELECT * FROM aers_tbl_events_gl where EveresId in (select EveresId from aers_tbl_eventsresume where ExamineState=1 and EveresName='153' and HappenedDate>=#HappenedDate#)
statements.insert: INSERT INTO aers_tbl_events_gl ( EveglId, EveresId, HospId, HospDepId, HappenedDate, SendtoDate, FillStaff, HospNumber, PatientSex, PatientAge, PatientAgeUnit, NursLevel, Diagnosis, IsEvaluate, EvaluateScore, EvaluateDate, IsTakePrevent, InGlTime, GlTypeOne, GlTypeTwo, FixedWay, OutGlState, MentalState, ActivityAbility, SelfcareAbility, OutGlReason, RestraintStrap, OtherReasons, OtherReasonsQt, ResetGl, Complication, ComplicationCx, ComplicationQt, EventDescription, EventLevel, StaffType, StaffTypeQt, StaffPosition, StaffEducation, StaffEduQt, StaffWorkyears, BedUtilization, BedNurseRatio, AuditFeedback, AuditStatus, Remark, IsFlag, OperatorDate, OperatorID, GlTypeOneQt, FixedWayQt, OutGlStateQt, MentalStateQt, ActivityAbilityQt ) VALUES ( #EveglId#, #EveresId#, #HospId#, #HospDepId#, #HappenedDate#, #SendtoDate#, #FillStaff#, #HospNumber#, #PatientSex#, #PatientAge#, #PatientAgeUnit#, #NursLevel#, #Diagnosis#, #IsEvaluate#, #EvaluateScore#, #EvaluateDate#, #IsTakePrevent#, #InGlTime#, #GlTypeOne#, #GlTypeTwo#, #FixedWay#, #OutGlState#, #MentalState#, #ActivityAbility#, #SelfcareAbility#, #OutGlReason#, #RestraintStrap#, #OtherReasons#, #OtherReasonsQt#, #ResetGl#, #Complication#, #ComplicationCx#, #ComplicationQt#, #EventDescription#, #EventLevel#, #StaffType#, #StaffTypeQt#, #StaffPosition#, #StaffEducation#, #StaffEduQt#, #StaffWorkyears#, #BedUtilization#, #BedNurseRatio#, #AuditFeedback#, #AuditStatus#, #Remark#, #IsFlag#, #OperatorDate#, #OperatorID#, #GlTypeOneQt#, #FixedWayQt#, #OutGlStateQt#, #MentalStateQt#, #ActivityAbilityQt# )
statements.update: UPDATE aers_tbl_events_gl SET EveglId = #EveglId#, EveresId = #EveresId#, HospId = #HospId#, HospDepId = #HospDepId#, HappenedDate = #HappenedDate#, SendtoDate = #SendtoDate#, FillStaff = #FillStaff#, HospNumber = #HospNumber#, PatientSex = #PatientSex#, PatientAge = #PatientAge#, PatientAgeUnit=#PatientAgeUnit#, NursLevel = #NursLevel#, Diagnosis = #Diagnosis#, IsEvaluate = #IsEvaluate#, EvaluateScore = #EvaluateScore#, EvaluateDate = #EvaluateDate#, IsTakePrevent = #IsTakePrevent#, InGlTime = #InGlTime#, GlTypeOne = #GlTypeOne#, GlTypeTwo = #GlTypeTwo#, FixedWay = #FixedWay#, OutGlState = #OutGlState#, MentalState = #MentalState#, ActivityAbility = #ActivityAbility#, SelfcareAbility = #SelfcareAbility#, OutGlReason = #OutGlReason#, RestraintStrap = #RestraintStrap#, OtherReasons = #OtherReasons#, OtherReasonsQt = #OtherReasonsQt#, ResetGl = #ResetGl#, Complication = #Complication#, ComplicationCx = #ComplicationCx#, ComplicationQt = #ComplicationQt#, EventDescription = #EventDescription#, EventLevel = #EventLevel#, StaffType = #StaffType#, StaffTypeQt = #StaffTypeQt#, StaffPosition = #StaffPosition#, StaffEducation = #StaffEducation#, StaffEduQt = #StaffEduQt#, StaffWorkyears = #StaffWorkyears#, BedUtilization = #BedUtilization#, BedNurseRatio = #BedNurseRatio#, AuditFeedback = #AuditFeedback#, AuditStatus = #AuditStatus#, Remark = #Remark#, IsFlag = #IsFlag#, OperatorDate = #OperatorDate#, OperatorID = #OperatorID#, GlTypeOneQt=#GlTypeOneQt#, FixedWayQt=#FixedWayQt#, OutGlStateQt=#OutGlStateQt#, MentalStateQt=#MentalStateQt#, ActivityAbilityQt=#ActivityAbilityQt# WHERE (EveglId = #EveglId#)
UPDATE aers_tbl_events_gl SET AuditFeedback = #AuditFeedback#, AuditStatus = #AuditStatus# WHERE (EveresId = #EveresId#)
